name: Enel
text:
If your leader has the {Sky Island} type, this character gains [Rush].
[When Attacking] You may trash 1 card from your hand: If your life has 1 or less cards, place up to 1 card from the top of your deck onto your life. Then give this character +1000 power for this turn.

effect.text: If your leader has the {Sky Island} type, this character gains [Rush].
You may trash 1 card from your hand: If your life has 1 or less cards, place up to 1 card from the top of your deck onto your life. Then give this character +1000 power for this turn.
